Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Beto O'Rourke is the only candidate for the U.S. Senate to call for impeaching President Donald Trump, when there are other candidates who have also expressed support for impeachment.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or data to back up the statement that Beto O'Rourke is the only candidate calling for impeachment.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Beto O'Rourke is the only candidate calling for impeachment without considering other candidates who may also support impeachment.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for Beto O'Rourke's stance on impeachment that are not mentioned in the claim, such as political strategy or personal beliefs.
